snippet: The two Tibetans sentenced were found guilty of urging others to set themselves on fire, and the sentences are among the harshest given by Chinese officials.
abstract: Chinese court gives severe prison sentences to Tibetans Lorang Konchok and Lorang Tsering on charges of urging eight people to set themselves on fire.
lead_paragraph: The two Tibetans sentenced were found guilty of urging others to set themselves on fire, and the sentences are among the harshest given by Chinese officials.

headline.seo: Chinese Court Issues Severe Sentences in Tibetan Self-Immolations
headline.main: Chinese Court Issues Severe Sentences in Tibetan Self-Immolations
headline.print_headline: China: 2 Tibetans Sentenced for Inciting Protests
